metadata.description: Spells that transform and alter air, weather, and atmospheric conditions

spells.name: Sailor's Foretaste of the Morrow
spells.description: Changes the local weather patterns to bring favorable conditions - calm winds, clear skies, or gentle rain as desired by the caster.

spells.name: Gift of the Bear's Fortitude
spells.description: Transforms the air around a person to provide perfect insulation against extreme temperatures, allowing survival in arctic cold or desert heat.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform air properties), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite

spells.name: Turn Air to Lightning
spells.description: Transforms a volume of air into crackling electrical energy that strikes a target with the force of natural lightning.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (transform air to energy), +2 Voice, +1 Ignem requisite

spells.name: Cloak of Mist
spells.description: Transforms the air around the caster into a concealing mist that follows them, providing cover and obscuring their movements.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (transform air to mist), +0 Personal, +2 Sun

spells.name: Vacuum of Perfect Silence
spells.description: Transforms the air in an area to prevent sound transmission, creating zones of complete silence where no noise can travel.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform air properties), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 Room

spells.name: Wings of Rushing Air
spells.description: Transforms the air around the caster to provide lift and propulsion, granting the ability to fly at moderate speed.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform air for flight), +0 Personal, +2 Sun

spells.name: Poisonous Cloud of Despair
spells.description: Transforms air into a toxic cloud that causes despair and weakness in those who breathe it, sapping their will to fight.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform air to toxin), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Room, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Solidify the Gusty Wind
spells.description: Transforms moving air into a solid barrier that can block passage or deflect projectiles while remaining invisible.

spells.name: Breath of the Dragon
spells.description: Transforms the caster's breath into a stream of fire, allowing them to breathe flames like a dragon for the duration.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform breath), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Ignem requisite

spells.name: Air of Peaceful Sleep
spells.description: Transforms the air to carry sleep-inducing properties, causing anyone who breathes it to fall into peaceful slumber.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform air properties), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Room, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Curse of the Desert Wind
spells.description: Transforms the local climate to become hot, dry, and harsh like a desert, withering plants and making life difficult for inhabitants.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (major climate change), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +4 Boundary

spells.name: Thunder Without Lightning
spells.description: Transforms air pressure to create a tremendous thunderclap that can deafen enemies and shatter fragile objects.
